actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the  Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to subject Federal land banks, Federal land bank associations, and Federal intermediate credit banks to the taxes imposed by such Code.

summary.text: Subjects Federal land banks, Federal land bank associations, and Federal intermediate credit banks to corporate taxes imposed by the Internal Revenue Code of 1954. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 501)

titles.title: To amend the  Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to subject Federal land banks, Federal land bank associations, and Federal intermediate credit banks to the taxes imposed by such Code.
